NATIONAL INTEGRATED MATERNAL AND PERINATAL CARE GUIDELINES FOR SOUTH AFRICA 
156 
Chapter 22: ROUTINE AND COMPLICATED POSTNATAL CARE 
P
ostnatal care after normal vaginal delivery 
What can postnatal care achieve? 
• Improve maternal and infant health.
• Provide information to mother on:
o Postpartum danger signs
o Routine postnatal visits
o Rest and sleep
o Personal hygiene
o Infant feeding
o Nutrition
o Contraception
o HIV
